name: OP Magic
description:
Description:

This is a platformer game with only one platform. It was made in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2019 GameJam.

How to Play:

Use your magic to move the tree trunk around. Bring it to the magic portal at the end of each section, then enter the portal after the platform got in and continue to the next portal. You can't move while you're using your magic, but you can jump, so use that to your advantage. There are 5 sections that make up only one level.

Controls:
  • Use WASD or the arrow keys and spacebar to move and jump
  • Hold left click to drag the platform
  • Hold right click while dragging to rotate the platform
  • Press E while dragging the platform to switch cameras
  • Press R to reset the instance and get the platform back if you lost it
  • Press Alt+Enter on Windows for fullscreen mode, and Alt+F4 to exit the game
Free Assets Used:
  1. Fantasy Forest game music by JivingGerbil (https://bit.ly/2M1Voty)
  2. Platformer Grass Tileset by Summer Thaxton and Hannah Cohan (PlatForge project)
  3. Free 2D Monster Sprites (craftpix.net)
  4. Free Cartoon Forest Game Backgrounds (craftpix.net)
  5. Trunks for platform game by Robert Brooks (gamedeveloperstudio.com)
  6. Vector cartoon stones by 0melapics (freepik.com)
